### How to upload data

Select the data to upload. There are two steps:

1.  Select the "Data upload type" (see table below).

2.  Select the file(s) to upload.

### Data upload type

| Data type | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| FSA              | The raw file from the Genetic Analyzer instrument. Must be .fsa file format.                                                                                                                                                          |
| EXAMPLE DATA     | Run an in-built example fsa file experiment, which consists a Huntington's disease cell line model with an unstable HTT repeat (refer to [our publication](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-024-47485-0)).                                                                                                                                                                                           |
